name: Oubliette Demo
description:
Oubliette is a 2D platformer focused on verticality, quick thinking and basic combat. This demo represents a 2D-level design, given the mechanics of moving and falling platforms, patrolling enemies, lock-and-door puzzles, spike traps, and platform variations such as icy walkways. 

Assets: https://bilge-kaan.itch.io
